page.title: 07PANSHANGER STABLES
page.content: Panshanger Stables are situated in the old stable yard belonging to the Panshanger Estate.Panshanger was built about 300 years ago.The person now running the stables hes been there for about eight years,but there has been a riding school there for the last 25 years. The riding school owner leases the stables and 19 acres of land from the{ {Redland Gravel Company}.They have 16 stalls and 9 loose boxes. The stables are open every day from 10 o'clock until 7 o'clock in the evening during the summer,but not as late in winter. The stables are a full time job.The lady works very hard with all the mucking out,grooming etc.The rest of the family do not help but two people come in and work part time.
